sentences.en: A voyeur was seen lurking around the girl's dormitory.

sentences.cn: 住校的男生在宿舍里睡觉.

sentences.en: Finally the head took Yaming to a different dormitory.
sentences.cn: 最后,校长把她带到别的宿舍去了.

sentences.en: First he went out of the dormitory to go to the toilet.
I want to go back to the dormitory now. "
She decided to head for the dormitory to take another crack at locating Blanche.
sentences.cn: 她决定回宿舍再找找布兰奇。

sentences.en: She lived in a college dormitory.
She lives in the dormitory on weekdays.

sentences.cn: 男孩子们被安排在宿舍里住下了.

sentences.en: The dormitory was aired in the morning.

sentences.en: The walls of his dormitory room were covered with sexy pin - ups.

sentences.en: There is a verdant lawn in front of the dormitory.
sentences.cn: 宿舍前是绿茵茵的草坪.

sentences.en: We were housed student-wise in dormitory rooms.
sentences.cn: 我们像学生一样住在宿舍里。

trans.tran_en: a large room for several people to sleep in, for example in a  boarding school  or  hostel
